DOC.brief_summary: 24 week open label study compare treatment either rosuvastatin rosuvastatin plus initiative improve compliance . If subject reach EAS LDL-C treatment goal week 12 , rosuvastatin titrate 10mg 20mg .
DOC.brief_title: ORBITAL : Open-Label Primary Care Study : Rosuvastatin Based Compliance Initiatives Linked To Achievement Of LDL Goals
DOC.criteria: Primary hypercholesterolaemia : Statin na√Øve subject ( LDLC level > 3.5 mmol/L ) subject ineffective `` start dose '' lipidlowering therapy ( LDLC level > 3.1 mmol/L ) . CV risk > 20 % , history CHD establish atherosclerotic disease History severe adverse event another HMGCoA reductase inhibitor Secondary hypercholesterolaemia ; Unstable cardiovascular disease ; Uncontrolled diabetes , active liver disease ; Severe hepatic renal impairment ; Treatment cyclosporin .
